industry_analysis.cost_trend: Advanced packaging (e.g., CoWoS) and rising wafer prices at leading-edge nodes (e.g., TSMC N5/N4) are major cost drivers. Increased complexity in AI accelerators pushes costs up.
industry_analysis.main_cost_driver: Advanced semiconductor manufacturing processes (e.g., TSMC 4N/5N, CoWoS packaging) and high-bandwidth memory (HBM)
